name: Auto Create Pull Request
on:
  push:
    branches-ignore:
      - main
  
jobs:
  create-pull-request:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions: 
      contents: write
      pull-requests: write
      statuses: write
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Install GitHub CLI

            ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏°‡∏£‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ï‡πÇ‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢ GitHub Action
